definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

sentences.english: Even as Abraham believed God, and it was accounted to him for righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 正如，亞伯拉罕信神，這就算爲他的義。

sentences.english: No thanks, I would rather go somewhere else.
sentences.chinese: 那就算了，我再去別的地方看看吧。

sentences.english: I'll get you home tomorrow if I have to shovel the whole road.
sentences.chinese: 明天就算鏟完整條路上的雪，我也一定要把你送到家。

sentences.english: You can't buy the time and save it in your storeroom even if you are Mr. Gates.
sentences.chinese: 你不能買下時間存在儲藏室裏，就算你是蓋茨也不行。

sentences.english: Even if the stomach, also don't want to take medicine. " x0 h!"
sentences.chinese: 就算胃疼的要死，也不會想要吃藥。

sentences.english: in later years, they'd come and go.
sentences.chinese: 後來幾年，就算有朋友，也都來去匆匆。

sentences.english: The slave might be your business manager, but all the slave could do is the paperwork.
sentences.chinese: 就算他爲你管理生意，也只能做做文書工作。

sentences.english: Even if the whole universe are black, I would also like to use my face around to kindle.
sentences.chinese: 就算全宇宙都是黑色的，我也要用我的笑容燃亮四周。

sentences.english: Even introverts know what loneliness feels like.
sentences.chinese: 就算是性格內向的人，也知道孤獨是什麼滋味。

sentences.english: Don't go getting so uppity even if you is the last chicken in Atlanta.
sentences.chinese: 不要那麼自大，就算你是亞特蘭的最後一隻雞。

sentences.english: Supposing that the chimpanzees were to be civilized by us, would they be happer for it?
sentences.chinese: 就算咱們把猩猩都開化了，它們因此更幸福嗎？

sentences.english: Your Sim will cheer for and be exited about doing the basic things in life. Yay! Wooo!
sentences.chinese: 易興奮的市民就算只是做生活中普通瑣事也會興奮。

sentences.english: Just because I disagree with you, you don't have to call me a bonehead.
sentences.chinese: 就算我不同意你，你也沒必要叫我笨蛋啊。

sentences.english: Readhead believes that, despite their best intentions, parents can be obstacles.
sentences.chinese: 瑞德赫德相信，就算心懷好意，家長也可能成爲阻礙。

sentences.english: Now that people are no longer superstitious , fortune-telling as a profession is finished.
sentences.chinese: 現在的人都不迷信了，因此算命這一行就算完了。

sentences.english: Just put in on with the rest of my hotel bill.
sentences.chinese: 就算到我其他的旅館費用算到一起。

definition: as before/(same) as usual/in the same manner/still/nevertheless
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
at the minimum/at the very least
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
